comments: The next two terms have 197 and 1744 decimal digits, respectively.a(n) counts the number of different ways in which a table of permutations for n objects can be arranged when one of them is fixed at the same place. Also: some of the first terms in this sequence belong to A010050. - _R. J. Cano_, Jan 23 2013
links: Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
author: Ken Alverson (KenA(AT)tso.cin.ix.ne)
extensions: Corrections made by Eric M. Schmidt, Jan 23 2013
